text: Clinocardium is a genus of molluscs in the family Cardiidae.Abbott, R.T. & Morris, P.A. A Field Guide to Shells: Atlantic and Gulf Coasts and the West Indies. New York: Houghton Mifflin, 1995. 58. ==Species== * Clinocardium braunsi * Clinocardium ciliatum (Fabricius, 1780) -- Iceland cockle * Clinocardium nuttallii ==References== Category:Cardiidae Category:Bivalve genera
title: Clinocardium
